name: div
features: Protection : Durable, lightweight shell with removable toe cover helps guard against wild pitches
Moisture Control : Nike Dri-FIT technology keeps you cool and dry by wicking away sweat
Fit Customization : Adjustable strap ensures a secure & personalized fit
Mobility : Low-profile ergonomic design supports a natural range of motion
Materials : 51% polyethylene / 26% polyester / 15% ethylene vinyl acetate / 6% rubber / 2% polyurethane
